name: Wireless Headphones
description: Premium noise-cancelling wireless headphones with 30-hour battery life

name: Smart Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracking smartwatch with heart rate monitor

name: Coffee Maker
description: Programmable drip coffee maker with thermal carafe

name: Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip premium yoga mat with alignment lines

name: Laptop Stand
description: Adjustable aluminum laptop stand for ergonomic workspace

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable waterproof Bluetooth speaker with 360° sound

name: Gaming Mouse
description: High-precision RGB gaming mouse designed for competitive gaming, featuring adjustable DPI up to 16000, ergonomic grip, and ultra-fast response time for smooth and accurate gameplay.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: Durable mechanical keyboard with tactile switches, customizable RGB backlighting, and anti-ghosting technology, ideal for both gaming and professional typing.

name: Air Purifier
description: Advanced HEPA air purifier designed to remove 99.97% of airborne particles, allergens, and odors, providing clean and fresh air for medium to large rooms.

name: Electric Kettle
description: Fast-boiling stainless steel electric kettle with temperature control, automatic shut-off, and sleek modern design for everyday kitchen convenience.

name: Office Chair
description: Ergonomic office chair with breathable mesh back, adjustable lumbar support, and smooth-rolling wheels to ensure all-day comfort during long working hours.

name: Fitness Dumbbell Set
description: Adjustable dumbbell set suitable for home workouts, made with durable materials and ergonomic handles to support strength training and muscle building.

name: Backpack
description: Multi-compartment travel and laptop backpack made from water-resistant fabric, designed for daily commuting, travel, and business use.

name: Desk Lamp
description: LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness levels, eye-care lighting technology, and flexible arm, perfect for studying, reading, or office work.

name: Power Bank
description: High-capacity portable power bank with fast charging support and multiple output ports, ensuring your devices stay powered throughout the day.

name: Smart LED TV
description: Ultra HD smart LED TV with vibrant display, built-in streaming apps, and voice control support, delivering an immersive home entertainment experience.
